org.lenskit.data.dao

Class MapItemNameDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.data.dao.MapItemNameDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ItemDAO, ItemNameDAO

    @Shareable
public class MapItemNameDAO
extends Object
implements ItemNameDAO, ItemDAO, Serializable

    An item name DAO backed by a map of item IDs to names.

    Since:
    2.2
    See Also:
    ItemNameDAO, Serialized Form
